citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 e 3
At the time of inspection rabbit protocol 327 was reviewed, the protocol involves an antibody study, but the
investigator failed to indicate how much of the adjuvant would be injected in each of the sites and the investigator
also failed to indicate how much blood would be withdrawn from the rabbit during its bleeds.
The investigator needs to provide a complete description for the use of rabbits in the antibody study
Correct by 12/20/15
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection with the facility.

narrative:

Item IACUC 2.31 e 3
At the time of inspection rabbit protocol 327  was reviewed,  the protocol involves an antibody study,  but the
investigator failed to indicate how much of the adjuvant would be injected in each of  the sites and the investigator
also failed to indicate how much blood would be withdrawn from the rabbit during its bleeds.
